                       SearchServer server,
                       java.lang.Class<T> c)
        Creates a new instance of BeanPageResult.
        Parameters:
        numOfResults - Number of documents returned by the search server instance.
        results - A list of results parsed to T.
        searchQuery - The fulltext query executed to retrieve this set of results.
        facetResults - The different faceted results of the query.
        server - A search server implementation.
        c - Annotated class to parse the results to.
